name: Scorchlete
description: A fiery young athlete who trains in volcanic craters. Its molten body radiates intense heat, and its incredible speed allows it to outmaneuver most opponents with blazing attacks.

ability.name: Speed Boost
ability.description: Speed increases by 50% each turn. Fire-type moves have 15% increased critical hit rate.

moves.name: Flame Dash
moves.description: A quick dash wreathed in flames. Always goes first and may burn the target.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The user shoots flames at the target. May cause burn.

moves.name: Magma Burst
moves.description: Erupts molten lava at all enemies. High power but lower accuracy.

moves.name: Rapid Strike
moves.description: Strikes 2-5 times in rapid succession. Power increases with speed.
